title: Ticket #3998: condor-reuse-slotN can't logon locally on CSL windows nodes
description:
The dynamic slot users on windows (condor-reuse-slotN) are added to the local group "Users". This is how they get the priviledges to run jobs. In the CSL the AD policy prohibits the local "Users" group from logging in, so the condor-reuse-slotN accounts can't login and thus fail to run jobs.

Therefore we need a way to tell HTCondor to put the dynamic run accounts into local group other than "Users". A new knob DYNAMIC_RUN_ACCOUNT_LOCAL_GROUP will be used to configure this. If this knob is not set, the HTCondor will default to the behavior of adding dynamic run accounts to the local group called "Users".
